definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
NCEE, National College Entrance Examination (college entrance exam in PRC)/usually abbr. to 高考[gao1 kao3]
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 Gao1 deng3 Xue2 xiao4 Zhao1 sheng1 Quan2 guo2 Tong3 yi1 Kao3 shi4
containing_words.word: 普通高等学校招生全国统一考试

sentences.english: Testing plays an important part in university's teaching and quality administration.
sentences.chinese: 考试是高等学校教学管理和质量管理的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: Subject building is the fundamentality of universities and colleges.
sentences.chinese: 学科建设是高等学校的根本。

sentences.english: Library is an important composition part of teaching and scientific research in college and university.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校图书馆是高校教学科研工作的重要组成郑分。

sentences.english: Police academy is a part of the ordinary colleges.
sentences.chinese: 公安院校是全国普通高等学校的组成部分。

sentences.english: Fourth, we will reform the management and adMissions systems of institutions of higher learning.
sentences.chinese: 四是推进高等学校管理体制和招生制度改革。

sentences.english: Money-raising is the key for the survival and the development of the university.
sentences.chinese: 高校筹资是高等学校生存和发展的命脉。

sentences.english: This course is part of the three-year program for non-English majors in our university.
sentences.chinese: 本课程的教学对象是高等学校非英语专业的专科生。

sentences.english: Currently the undergraduate colleges newly upgraded are an important component of colleges and universities in China.
sentences.chinese: 新升本科院校是我国高等学校的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The State supports qualified higher education institutions to become research bases of the State.
sentences.chinese: 国家支持具备条件的高等学校成为国家科学研究基地。

sentences.english: Constitution Studies is one of the basic courses for the specialty of law.
sentences.chinese: 宪法学是高等学校法学专业的基础课程之一。

sentences.english: The institutes of higher learning undertake the lofty responsibility in the promotion of the allround development of human.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校在促进人的全面发展方面肩负着崇高的责任。

sentences.english: The shift of educational functions and the reforms in higher education have double-way effects on each other.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校职能变化与高等教育的改革互为因果关系。

sentences.english: The education in universities and colleges should have a combination between law and virtue.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校要把依法治校和以德治校有机统一起来。

sentences.english: The university is one kind of typical knowledge-intensive organization.
sentences.chinese: 高等学校是一种典型的知识密集型组织。

sentences.english: Specific standards for the establishment of institutions of higher learning shall be formulated by the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 设立高等学校的具体标准由国务院制定。

sentences.english: Music Appreciation Course is one of the important methods that colleges and universities develop the artistic education.
sentences.chinese: 音乐欣赏课是高等学校开展艺术教育的重要途径之一。

definition: universities and colleges/abbr. for 高等學校|高等学校

pinyin: zhong1 deng3 zhuan1 ye4 xue2 xiao4

definition: secondary normal school (secondary school that trains kindergarten and elementary school teachers)
pinyin: zhong1 deng3 shi1 fan4 xue2 xiao4
ren2 wen2 she4 hui4 xue2 ke1
